team_discoverability.desc: Who can join the team. A team's discoverability can be `open`, `closed`, `invite_only`, or `unlisted`.

team_domain.desc: Team domain (for example, slacksoftballteam). Domains are limited to 21 characters.

team_name.desc: Team name (for example, Slack Softball Team).

errors.bad_url: Invalid URL. Note that domains can be at most 21 characters.
errors.could_not_create_workspace: The workspace could not be created.
errors.discoverability_setting_invalid: The given discoverability setting is invalid.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.
errors.must_provide_team_domain: No team domain has been provided.
errors.must_provide_team_name: No team name has been provided.
errors.name_taken_in_org: The team with the specified name already exists in the org.
errors.not_an_admin: This method is only accessible by org owners and admins.
